xwikidoc.name: Translations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.title: Translations
xwikidoc.content:
# Class BookVersions.Code.VersionClass_precedingVersionReference=Preceding version reference BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_draft=Draft BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_review=Review BookVersions.Code.PageStatusClass_status_complete=Complete
# Library Reference Class BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference=Library Reference BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference.Empty=--- BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryReference_= BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference=Library Version Reference BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference.Empty=--- BookVersions.Code.LibraryReferenceClass_libraryVersionReference_=
# Publication Configuration Class BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source=Source page* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_source_hint=The top page of the tree to be published, usually the top page of the book/library. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace=Destination space* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_destinationSpace_hint=The space where the content will be published. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version=Version* BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_version_hint=The version to publish. (Mandatory) BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant=Variant BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_variant_hint=The variant to publish. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language=Language BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_language_hint=The language to publish. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete=Publish only "Complete" pages BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishOnlyComplete_hint=Publish only the pages with the status "Complete". If unchecked, all statuses are published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder=Publish page order BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishPageOrder_hint=Publish the page order from the source, which might overwrite the target ordering. If unchecked, the target ordering is left untouched. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour=Publication behaviour BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_hint=Which behaviour to adopt when the target space is already populated. "Cancel" for not publishing ; "Update" to publish update existing pages, add new pages from source but leave page deleted from source in the destination. Pages marked as deleted in source will be removed from destination. ; "Re-publish" to reset the destination space. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_cancel=Cancel BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_update=Update BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_publishBehaviour_republish=Re-publish BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description=Description BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass_description_hint=The description of the configuration BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationLabel=Location BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.sourceLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the source of the publication BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceLabel=Name of the space BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationSpaceHint=(optional) If you want to create a new space with the specified name. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationLabel=Destination BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationLocationHint=Location in the page hierarchy which will be the destination of the publication BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiLabel=Wiki name BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationClass.destinationWikiHint=Name of the wiki for the publication destination
# Sheet BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.versionConfiguration=Version Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.librariesConfiguration=Libraries Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.newConfiguration=New configuration BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.associatedPages=Associated Pages BookVersions.Code.VariantClassSheet.variantConfiguration=Variant Configuration BookVersions.Code.VersionClassSheet.deleteLibrairieConfiguration=Delete BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.titlePrefix=DELETED: BookVersions.Code.DeletedContentClassSheet.warning=This content has been marked as deleted. It won't be published. BookVersions.Code.PublicationConfigurationSheet.nextButton=Publish
# Creation templates BookVersions.template.newBook=Create a new book. BookVersions.template.newLibrary=Create a new library. BookVersions.template.description=Description BookVersions.template.title=Title
# Page Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPage=New page BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle=Page title BookVersions.creationForm.pageTitle.hint=The title of the page. BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned=Unversioned content BookVersions.creationForm.pageUnversioned.hint=When the page is unversioned, the option of creating different content for multiple versions will be disabled and the same content of the page will be displayed in all versions of the book. It will be possible, though, to switch back to versioned content. BookVersions.creationForm.create=Create BookVersions.creationForm.add=Add BookVersions.creationForm.name=Name BookVersions.creationForm.libTitle=Library title
# Version Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newVersion=New version
# Variant Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newVariant=New variant
# Library Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newLibrary=Add library
# Publication Configuration Creation form BookVersions.creationForm.newPublicationConfiguration=Add publication configuration
# Navigation menu BookVersions.navMenu.versionSelect=Version BookVersions.navMenu.versioned=Content from version {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.inherited=Content inherited from version {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.unversioned=Content is {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.unversionedTitle=unversioned BookVersions.navMenu.createVersionWithLink=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.navMenu.warning.noversion=The page is versioned, but it doesn''t have content for version {0} or its preceding versions. BookVersions.navMenu.variantSelect=Variant BookVersions.navMenu.contentForVariant= BookVersions.navMenu.pageIsNotAssociated=Page not linked to variant {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.pageAvailableForAll=Page is not restricted to a variant. BookVersions.navMenu.pageRestrictedTo=Page is restricted to variant(s): {0}. BookVersions.navMenu.associateVariantWithLink=Link page to variant {0} BookVersions.navMenu.languageSelect=Language BookVersions.navMenu.currentLanguage= BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected= # Administration menu BookVersions.adminMenu.title=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manage=Manage BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVersions=Versions BookVersions.adminMenu.manageVariants=Variants BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLibraries=Libraries BookVersions.adminMenu.manageLanguages=Languages BookVersions.adminMenu.pageActions=Page Actions BookVersions.adminMenu.addPageToVariant=Link page to variant {0} BookVersions.adminMenu.removePageFromVariant=Unlink page from variant {0} BookVersions.adminMenu.publishLable=Publishing BookVersions.navMenu.convertToUnversioned=Convert to unversioned BookVersions.navMenu.convertToVersioned=Convert to versioned BookVersions.adminMenu.statusLable=Status BookVersions.adminMenu.publish=Publication BookVersions.navMenu.markDeleted=Mark as deleted BookVersions.navMenu.unmarkDeleted=Unmark as deleted BookVersions.navMenu.deleteVersion=Delete this version BookVersions.navMenu.deleteAllVersions=Delete all versions BookVersions.navMenu.deletePage=Delete this page BookVersions.navMenu.noLanguageSelected=No language was selected. BookVersions.navMenu.defaultLanguage=Default language. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.not_translated=Translation needed. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.outdated=Outdated translation. BookVersions.navMenu.translationStatus.translated=Translation done. BookVersions.adminMenu.librariesText=The following libraries are configured to be used in the current book. To edit the configuration, go to the {0}Versions administration page of the book{1} and edit the version pages.
# PageSheet content BookVersion.pageSheet.nocontent=There is no content for this version

# Variants linked pages Admin UI BookVersions.variants.linkedPagesListHeading=Pages linked with selected variant BookVersions.variants.macrosPagesListHeading=Pages containing variant macro BookVersions.variants.noLinkedPage=No pages linked to this variant. BookVersions.variants.noMacroUsingPage=No pages use this variant macro. BookVersions.variants.showPagesForVariant=Show linked pages for variant:
# Library include macro rendering.macro.includeLibrary.name=Include Library rendering.macro.includeLibrary.description=Include content from a versioned library rendering.macro.includeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.name=Library key rendering.macro.includeLibrary.parameter.keyReference.description=The key of a library to get the content from

# Multilingual BookVersions.languages.warning=There is no translation for the selected language. BookVersions.languages.title.missing=There is no translated title for the selected language. BookVersions.language.select=Select language ... BookVersions.Code.MultilingualClass_enabled=Support multiple translation languages BookVersions.Code.MultilingualClass_supportedLanguages=Enabled translation languages
# Edit inherited content BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupTitle=Edit inherited content from {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupDescription=The content for version {0} does not exist. You have the option to either create the content for this version, or to switch to version {1}. BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupSwitchVersion=Switch to version {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCreateContentForVersion=Create content for version {0} BookVersions.Code.CustomEditHandler.popupCancel=Cancel
